item.title: How I Built A Simple (Horrible) 3D Graphics Engine in python matplotlib - Part 3: Square but 3D
item.description: Now that we have the basic on plotting a line in plt, in this post I want to expand more on creating cube primitive.

item.title: How I Built A Simple (Horrible) 3D Graphics Engine in python matplotlib - Part 2: Plotting with plt
item.description: Think of the usual way on how you’d use this library; plotting time series data, market cap analysis, basically anything tubular and qualitative data can be visualized using this kind of representation.

item.title: How I Built A Simple (Horrible) 3D Graphics Engine in python matplotlib - Part 1: Intro
item.description: Around mid 2022 when I was working at Pertamina, I was assigned into various AI/ML related projects. Needless to say, I was thrilled and enjoyed the audacity to fuck-around and try new things.
